description.benefit: makes adapting your application to different markets easy.

integration.caption: Tech stack agnostic
integration.title: Integrates into any codebase
integration.description: Inlang is designed to be stack agnostic. Developers can write their own plugins, or rely on the plugin ecosystem, to adapt inlang to their tech stack (React, Flutter, iOS, Python, etc.).

editor.title: Web Editor
editor.description: No-code editor to manage your translations.
editor.benefit1: No translator needs to touch code
editor.benefit3: No sync pipelines and extra accounts

extension.title: IDE Extension
extension.description: Handle translations directly in VSCode through an extension.

cli.title: inlang CLI
cli.description: CLI to interact with inlang's infrastructure.

pricing.title: Free for individual use and open source
pricing.caption: Pricing
pricing.description: Inlang is a commercial product. But, individual use and open source stays free. We see individual use as good "marketing" that helps us acquiring enterprise customers.

getstarted.caption: Add inlang to your project
getstarted.title: Take your software global
getstarted.description: Setup inlang in your code base and start using IDE extension, CLI and web editor.

error.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
error.alreadySubscribed: You are already subscribed to our newsletter.
